Code Example

    public function count_drums()

    {

        $current_month = Carbon::now()->month;

        $current_year = Carbon::now()->year;



        //get all drum counts from this month and year

        $drums = DB::select(DB::raw(

                       "select lotlogs.id, histories.count, lotlogs.product_category, histories.month, histories.year 

                         from lotlogs 

                         inner join histories

                         on lotlogs.id = histories.lotlog_id 

                         where lotlogs.product_category = 'drums' and histories.month = '$current_month' 

                         and histories.year = '$current_year'"

                         ));



        //get the count of all the drums from this month and year

        $value = 0;

        foreach ($drums as $drum) {

            $drum_count = $drum->count;

            $value += $drum_count;

        }

        return $value;

    }
